name: Fatinja
description:
You are a ninja in training. Your mission is to throw your kunai at the targets in the least amount of turns. Each second is a turn.

Controls:

  • WS to zoom in/out
  • AD to rotate the camera
  • Left click cancels current selected move
  • R restarts the level
  • Esc quits to level selector (during a level)
  • Esc quits the game during level selector

Known bugs:

  • Jumping feels off and is most likely to result in weird behavior
  • Jumping/Hanging during the first turn doesn't work properly
  • Jumping/Hanging don't always work during running
